AND content LIKE '%' #{searchValue} '%'

SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE delyn = 'N' AND category = '2'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT nidx, LAG(nidx,1,-1) OVER (ORDER BY nidx) AS pre, LEAD(nidx) OVER(ORDER BY nidx) AS next FROM notice WHERE delyn = 'N' AND category = '2' GROUP BY nidx) A WHERE nidx = #{nidx};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT nidx, LAG(title,1,-1) OVER (order by nidx) AS preTitle, LEAD(title) OVER(ORDER BY nidx) AS nextTitle FROM notice WHERE delyn = 'N' AND category = '2' GROUP BY nidx) A WHERE nidx = #{nidx};
